---
title: Blood Pressure (BP)
---



| Stage | SBP | | DBP |
|-|-|-|-|
| Normal | <120 | AND | <80 |
| Elevated | 120-129 | AND | <80 |
| Stage 1 | 130-139 | AND/OR | 80-89|
| Stage 2 | 140+ | AND/OR | 90 |
| Hypertensive crisis | >180 | AND/OR | >120 |
